disappeared.

DeepGraph
=========

DeepGraph is an efficient, general-purpose data analysis Python package. Based
on pandas DataFrames, it provides means to analyze data via graph theory
(a.k.a. networks).

Documentation
-------------

http://deepgraph.readthedocs.org
